snippet: The study had suggested that gay political canvassers could change conservative voters’ views on same-sex marriage.
abstract: Dr Donald Green, senior author of study published in journal Science concluding that gay political canvassers could change views of conservative voters on same-sex marriage, requests study be retracted due to faulty data submitted by co-author Michael LaCour; Science editor in chief Marcia McNutt says she is considering case carefully.

byline.original: By BENEDICT CAREY and PAM BELLUCK

lead_paragraph: The study had suggested that gay political canvassers could change conservative voters’ views on same-sex marriage.

headline.main: Retraction Sought in Study on Views of Gay Marriage
headline.print_headline: Retraction Sought in Study on Views of Gay Marriage

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
